price: គឺយើងរួសរាន់ប្រទានឱ្យពួកគេនូវប្រការល្អឬ? ផ្ទុយទៅ វិញ ពួកគេមិនដឹងខ្លួនឡើយ។
arabic: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِۚ بَل لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: nusāriʿu lahum fī al-khayrāti bal lā yashʿurūna
